name: electron-nitro-basic-app
description: electron app with hosting nitro backend

scripts.build: tsc -p src/electron && pnpm copy-icons && nitro build && electron-builder
scripts.build:linux: tsc -p src/electron && pnpm copy-icons && nitro build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:deb:arm64: tsc -p src/electron && pnpm copy-icons && nitro build && electron-builder --linux deb --arm64
scripts.dev: tsc -p src/electron && pnpm copy-icons && nitro dev
